item.title: Today’s Wordle #1602: Hints And Answer For November 7, 2025
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1602 for November 7, 2025.

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here. If you’ve missed any days, check out our Wordle Answer Archive for every past answer.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, November 7, 2025

The Wordle answer for game #1602 is going to present a challenge for some players. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 4.3 of 6 guesses. That makes it tougher than the 3.8 guess average on November 5.

General Wordle Hints For November 7

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • RELIC
  • PILED
  • RIPLE
  • PLIER

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1602 for November 7, 2025

Starter Words For November 7, 2025

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • Hint 1: A situation where caution is strongly advised.
  • Hint 2: Often used in fantasy or adventure narratives.
  • Hint 3: Shares a root with a word meaning to put something at risk.
  • Hint 4: Not a physical object, but more of a circumstance or state.

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1602 On November 7, 2025

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: PERIL

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1601 on November 6, 2025:

Answer: GUISE

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles. Reminder, you can check out every past Wordle answer in our official archive.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1602?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on November 8 will be Wordle Game #1603.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

Need more help with other daily games? Let us know what games you’d like tips and clues for in the comments below, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Pokémon Is Breaking Level 100 Cap For First Time Ever
item.content:encoded:
We’ve finally learned about Pokémon Legends: Z-A’s first DLC—Mega Dimension. It adds new Mega Evolutions and missions, but we’ve also learned that your Pokémon can go above Level 100—a series first.

For decades, the rule on Pokémon has been simple: Once your Mon reaches Level 100, it has pretty much reached the peak of its powers. Yes, it will be extraordinarily strong and unbeatable, and one of them can pretty much sit on the Elite Four single-handedly, but Level 101 is out of the question.

You Can Go Over The Level 100 Pokémon Cap In Mega Dimension DLC

If you look at the screenshot above, you can see the new Mega Baxcalibur and its mind-blowing Lv. 162 status. So, not only are we breaching Level 100 for the first time, we’re completely jumping the shark.

As shown by the new Pokémon Legends: Z-A DLC trailer for Mega Dimensions, Pokémon can finally breach the max level cap.

An official blog explained:

“In Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Mega Dimension, Trainers will revisit Lumiose as spatial distortions begin to form around the city. Donut chef Ansha and her companion, the Mythical Pokémon Hoopa, will guide players as they explore the mysterious dimension known as Hyperspace Lumiose. This not-quite Lumiose City is home to newly discovered Mega-Evolved Pokémon and other Pokémon not usually found in Lumiose, some of which can exceed the normal limit of Lv. 100 with hyperspace levels.“

This seems like a gimmick feature exclusive to the Mega Dimension DLC. We’re not 100% how the mechanic works, but it’s likely these will only be temporary level boosts, and your Pokémon won’t be able to stay above Level 100 for the entire game.

What do you think? Is this a game-changer? Does it set an interesting precedent for future Pokémon content and games? Let us know what you think about Mega Dimension breaking the level cap in the usual place—The Insider Gaming Discord Server.

Check out more Pokémon content, including our Pokémon Phantasmal Flames hub, and How to Get Mega Diancie in Pokémon Legends: Z-A.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.
